content.rendered:
Overview

Designed to elevate your personal space, the luxurious residences at Tripundra offer you a unique feeling of belongingness in the prospering locale of New Delhi. Come home to elegantly designed spaces that speak your language of comfort and utility with the capacity to transform as per your taste and preferences. Witness a perfect blend of luxury, where you enjoy a plethora of unique experiences catering to the needs of every age group. A truly special place built to redefine luxury living.

2 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

3 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH A RESORT-LIKE LIFESTYLE

Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.
  • Living & Dining
  • Floor: Premium Polished High Quality Italian Marble
  • Wall: Plastered Surface with P.O.P Punning and Acrylic Emulsion Paint Finish
  • Ceiling: Acrylic Emulsion Paint on P.O.P False Ceiling
  • Fixtures: Air-Conditioners – Daikin/Mitsubishi or Equivalent
  • Concealed Lights – Jaguar/Wipro or Equivalent
  • Ceiling Fan – Orient/Crompton or Equivalent

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH WORLD-CLASS SPORTS FACILITIES

Be a sport for life with the sports facilities here; whatever be your preference, you have a choice.

  • Bedrooms
  • Floor: High Quality Laminated Wooden Flooring
  • Wall: Plastered Surface with P.O.P Punning and Acrylic Emulsion Paint Finish
  • Ceiling: Acrylic Emulsion Paint on P.O.P False Ceiling
  • Fixtures: Air-Conditioners – Daikin/Mitsubishi or Equivalent
  • Concealed Lights – Jaguar/Wipro or Equivalent
  • Ceiling Fan – Orient/Crompton or Equivalent
  • Wardrobes: All Bedrooms are Fitted with Factory made
  • Branded Wardrobes with Imported
  • Hardware – Spacewood/Hettich or Equivalent

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH AN ACTIVE SOCIAL LIFE

Love to mingle? This is the place for you. Whether it’s about old friends coming over or making new ones in the neighborhood, your social life is sure to thrive here.

  • Floor: High Quality Wooden Laminate Flooring
  • Wall: Plastered Surface with P.O.P Punning and Acrylic Emulsion Paint Finish
  • Ceiling: Acrylic Emulsion Paint on P.O.P False Ceiling
    Windows
  • Main Door: Solid Core 44mm Door with Polished Veneer and Equipped with
  • Digital Lock for Adequate Safety and Security – Spacewood/Mikasa/Dorset/
    Godrej or Equivalent
  • Internal Door: 32mm Flush Door with Laminate
  • Frame: Imported Anodized Aluminum – Tostem or 
  • Glass Panels: Sliders to have Double-glazed Units with 6mm Toughened Glass on both Sides with a 10mm Air Gap between for Proper Sound and Heat Insulation, other Windows to have Single Glazed 6mm Toughened Glass –
    Saint Gobain or Equivalent

CHANGE TO HOMES WHERE THE KIDS HAVE FUN TOO

Anytime is fun-time here for the little ones. All their need for excitement and activities has been well taken care of.

  • Floor: Premium Polished High Quality Italian Marble
  • Wall: Large Format Vitrified Tiles – Nexion/Kajaria or Equivalent
  • Ceiling: Acrylic Emulsion Paint on P.O.P. False Ceiling
  • Counter: Quartzite
  • Fittings: Branded Modular kitchen with Imported
  • Hardware – Spacewood/Hettich or Equivalent
  • Appliances: Built-in Microwave, Built-in OTG, Refrigerator, 4 Burner Hob,Chimney,
  • Washing Machine – Bosch/Siemens or Equivalent
  • Fixtures: Concealed Lights – Jaguar/Wipro or Equivalent

FLOOR PLANS

LOCATION MAP

OPEN UP TO A GREAT LOCATION

  •  IGI Airport – 4.6 Km
  •  Radisson Gurugram – 5.1 Km
  •  Ambience Mall – 5.2 Km
  •  Dwarka Sector 21 Metro Station – 5.2 Km
  •  NH 48 – 6.6 Km
  •  The NorthCap University – 6.7 Km
  • IGBC Pre-certified gold rated green building
  • Organic waste management
  • Water efficient fixtures
  • Rainwater harvesting
  • Ample green space with use of native plants in the landscape
  • Dual flushing system
  • Low VOC materials
  • Use of LED lights in common areas

ABOUT TARC GROUP

Facilitating a life of Experiential Living for all With a fruitful journey of over four decades, The Anant Raj Corporation has successfully developed multiple projects across the Delhi-NCR region exhibiting strong domain capabilities in land acquisition across diverse verticals. We at TARC are geared up for the next phase of incremental growth and seek to unlock immense value by creating a bouquet of marquee projects in New Delhi.

Site Address :TRAC Tripundra – Main Bijwasan Road, Facing Pushpanjali Greens, Delhi – 110037

B R O C H U R E   D O W N L O A D

Do you want to talk with one of our Real Estate Experts?

Call Now: +91 9565 699 699
